Text: Game is in actual fact GREAT FUN and hopefully we have a few seeders, al let you know if it works alright etc...

Yes, the game is a quite unoriginal classic ""tycoon" game, but it is indeed fun and easy to play. 
The game is kinda like Rollercoaster Tycoon 1 and 2, with better graphics.

I am having problems starting the game

First, I installed the game
Second, I replaced the crack/patch (named: golf) with the one in the file directory.

Should it not be running when i click on the "autorun" file then? 

What am I doing wrong?

Help

All it says is:

Cannot locate CD-Rom - Please select the CD-Rom and restart the application

This game doesn't need a patch or a CD key, it's way too old for that :P The patch (v1.03) does not replace the original .exe.  Instead, you double click on the patch and it will install a few updates.  Sorry for any confusion.
As for problems with it not finding the CD, I'm sorry, but I haven't had that problem myself.  Note that I've only tested it with Alcohol 120%, so while burning it to a CD should work, it might not.
Seed It Please ! It is one of the best old games by Maxis ! I love it ! I played the demo version(the only one, which I can got ) for about 1 year, when I was young ;) fucking good times...
I also get the "insertCD message...  whatup?
Finally!I've had enough of the supid max 3 holes in the demo!now il have 18!
im with andrevus the demo with 3 holes sucks soo bad, thanks for the fulll game

Works perfect! Simple as fuck to install. Used MagicISO. Just mount - go to the cd - find setup - run - run patch - and finally PLAY!
